hero.title: Train better. Train with purpose.
hero.subtitle: Fitzio connects coaches and athletes to make training smarter, more efficient, and more personal.

workouts.title: Create & Assign Workouts
workouts.description: Coaches can easily create, customize, and assign workouts to their athletes.

completion.title: Easy Completion
completion.description: Athletes receive and complete workouts with a simple, intuitive interface.

progress.title: Smart Progress
progress.description: Secure payments and intelligent tracking to monitor progress effectively.

trainers.title: For Trainers
trainers.feature2: Assign workouts to individual athletes or groups
trainers.feature4: Track athlete progress and completion rates

athletes.title: For Athletes
athletes.feature4: Track your training progress over time

app.title: Get the Fitzio App
app.subtitle: Train anywhere, anytime. Download our mobile app for the best experience.

testimonial.title: What Our Users Say
testimonial.quote: Now I can focus on coaching, not managing files and messages.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.intro: At Fitzio, we are committed to protecting your privacy. We collect the following information:

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.intro: We use the collected information to:
section2.item3: Enable communication between trainers and athletes
section2.item4: Analyze trends and improve the platform
section2.item5: Send important notifications about your account

section3.title: 3. Data Sharing
section3.intro: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. We share information in the following circumstances:
section3.item1: Between trainers and athletes who are connected on the platform
section3.item2: With service providers who help us operate the platform
section3.item3: When required by law or to protect our rights

section4.title: 4. Data Security
section4.content: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure or destruction.

section5.title: 5. Your Rights
section5.intro: As a user, you have the right to:
section5.item3: Delete your account and associated data
section5.item5: Request a copy of your data

section6.title: 6. Cookies and Similar Technologies
section6.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience, understand how you use our services, and personalize content.

section7.title: 7. Changes to This Policy
section7.content: We may update this privacy policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes through a notice on our application or by email.

section8.title: 8. Contact
section8.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy or how we handle your data, contact us at:
